labels.too_much_glare_face_capture: Too much light, move face away from direct light
labels.out_of_focus_fc_detect: Tap screen to focus or move camera closer/away
labels.subject_is_too_dark_fc_detect: It's too dark to take a good image. Find a place with better lighting.
labels.move_camera_closer_to_your_face: Move camera closer to face and look towards light.
labels.smile_please: Hold camera steady and smile please.
labels.camera_error: Unable to start the camera, please restart the device.
labels.turn_left: Turn your head slowly to the left
labels.turn_right: Turn your head slowly to the right
labels.look_straight: Please look straight into the phone
labels.face_detection_instruction:
Take an interactive selfie.
Do not wear GLASSES or HAT.
Do not have LIGHT behind you.
When you see turn arrow, please TURN your head slowly.
labels.passive_face_detection_instruction:
Before taking a selfie, remove your glasses and/or hat and avoid excessive backlighting.
To capture your selfie automatically, frame your face inside the oval and position your device at eye level while looking directly into the camera.
labels.fd_too_much_ligth_error: Excessive backlighting detected. Please reduce backlighting to proceed
labels.fd_face_model_downloading:
Please wait...
Required components are being downloaded
labels.fd_frame_face_inside: Frame your face inside the oval and look directly into the camera.
labels.fd_too_dark_error: Excessive darkness detected. Please reduce darkness to proceed.
labels.face_capture_preview_message: Verify your eyes are open and there is no excessive light in the background.
labels.live_face_not_detected_msg: Live face is not detected.please try again

labels.vc_text_label_message: Please wait while we setup conference
